column4: I've got a 15,000 song music collection and when playing it through Rhythmbox, some songs are much louder than others. How can I normalise the volume of every track in my collection so that I don't have to manually change the system volume all the time?
you can learn more about that here: http://replaygain.hydrogenaudio.org/
http://www.bobulous.org.uk/misc/Replay-Gain-in-Linux.html --- seems your best bet for scanning your collection for replaygain is foobar2000 in wine
